page.title: 06POP CULTURE
page.content: A pop group is a group of musicians and one or more singers.The object of the group is to create a sound which is different from any other group's songs but which will be sure to sell. The popular pop groups and singers at the moment are as follows: Duran Duran; Wham; Mai Tai; Sister Sledge; David Bowie; U2; Phil Collins;Philip Bailey; Madonna; Paul Young; Nik Kershaw;Alison Moyet; Michael Jackson; Jermaine Jackson; Tears for Fears; Five Star; Debarge; OMD; Bucks Fizz; Frankie goes to Hollywood; Flying Pickets and Thompson Twins. Genesis, David Bowie, U2, and Status Quo, played at Milton Keynes Bowl. The biggest concerts were Genesis and Status Quo because they were their last concerts.
